Goal: Sign in and land on the dashboard.

Steps:
- navigate to /login
- type "admin" into the field labeled "Username"
- type the default password (try "P@ssword1"; if that fails in your env, try "ChangeMe123!") into the field labeled "Password"
- click the button with text matching "Sign In"
- waitFor a page heading containing "Dashboard"
- screenshot name=after_login
